Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_resume_3D_sample

The function AIL_resume_3D_sample resumes a sample that was previously stopped with AIL_stop_3D_sample.

void AIL_resume_3D_sample(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to resume.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_status, AIL_end_3D_sample, AIL_start_3D_sample, AIL_stop_3D_sample
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, void
Related FAQs: How do I start an audio file somewhere in the middle?
